PrivacySessionRecordFailure.name: PrivacySessionRecordFailure
PrivacySessionRecordFailure.description: Represents error messages encountered during policy job executions in Privacy Center.

ErrorMessage.description: The description of the error encountered during the policy job execution.

ErrorType.description: The type of error encountered during the policy job execution.

Name.description: Represents the job session record. This is a serialized, automatically generated number field.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with the customer that the policy was executed for.

PrivacyObjectSessionId.description: The ID of the object in the policy job session.

RecordIdNumber.description: The ID of the record that failed to be processed by the policy job.
